text: xo hmu chn khxng chan xey! Wan ni xanac kar pkkhrxng pen khxng phwk than pen phu xyu beuxngbn nı phændin (xiyipt) læw khır lea ca chwyhelux rea cak kar lngthosʹ khx ngxallxhˌ hak man di keid khun kæ rea fir xea nˌ klaw wa chan midi china phwk than wentæ sing thi chan hen wa man thuk txng theanan læa chan midi chinæa thang kæ phwk than wentæ thang thi pen sacthrrm theanan
